title: ZettleTweet Connector
description: A bridge application that connects your Zettelkasten note system with Twitter, allowing for seamless publishing of atomic notes as tweets and thread creation from connected notes.

fullDescription.content: ZettleTweet Connector is a bridge application that connects your Zettelkasten note system with Twitter, allowing for seamless publishing of atomic notes as tweets and thread creation from connected notes. It creates a two-way flow between your personal knowledge management system and your public social media presence.
The connector supports multiple Zettelkasten systems and provides flexible options for Twitter integration:

items.title: Note to Tweet
items.content: Publish individual notes as standalone tweets

items.title: Connected Notes to Thread
items.content: Transform a series of connected notes into a Twitter thread

items.title: Tweet to Note
items.content: Import your tweets or saved tweets from others into your Zettelkasten

items.title: Thread to Connected Notes
items.content: Import Twitter threads as a series of connected notes

fullDescription.content: ZettleTweet Connector includes automation features to streamline your workflow:

items: Scheduled publishing of notes as tweets
Automatic thread creation from notes with specific tags
Notification when tweets relevant to your notes are posted
Periodic import of your Twitter activity into your Zettelkasten

fullDescription.content: The connector is designed with privacy in mind, giving you complete control over what gets shared and how. Notes are never automatically published without explicit approval, and you can set up rules for what types of notes should never be considered for public sharing.
ZettleTweet Connector bridges the gap between private knowledge work and public discourse, allowing your ideas to flow seamlessly between these contexts while maintaining appropriate boundaries.
